description: Explore the future of frontend development with a focus on CSS advancements transforming logic handling, state management, and complex interactions traditionally managed by JavaScript. Dive into creative visual effects using WebGL particle systems and discover the potential of container queries for modular CSS. Enhance development efficiency with language model coding agents and Storybook integration, and stay updated with Chrome's latest CSS features. For those interested in web performance, learn practical strategies for optimizing Core Web Vitals.
joke: Why did the web developer go broke? Because they kept using 'margin: 0 auto;' and lost their center!
challenge: Create an interactive particle system using HTML5 Canvas. Transform a static image into a dynamic animation where particles respond to mouse movement and simulate physics-driven behavior. Optionally, incorporate WebGL shaders for enhanced visual effects and leverage CSS for styling. This project encourages creativity and experimentation with visual coding, offering insights into modern web animation techniques.
